name: Crazy Drifter
description:
Here is my first ever C# game I made completely by myself. I cut out internet so I could understand how far I can go without referring and I am satisfied by the extent that I could go. Much more to come though!

GitHub Repo : https://github.com/fr1nkenst3in/myfirst-csharp-game

Timelapse : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzS-Yzl865U
